name: All quiet here, how are you?

system.description: “If at first you don’t succeed, reboot and lie about it.” Mark Stress (up to your Proficiency) to lower the System Alert one level per Stress marked.
system.effect: Mark Stress (up to your Proficiency) to lower the System Alert one level per Stress marked.
system.blurb: “If at first you don’t succeed, reboot and lie about it.”
